languages.text: {n}Ваше тело измучено. Ваш разум надломлен. Невзирая на ваши исступленные вопли, ксенос довел свой чудовищный эксперимент до конца прежде чем оставил вас в покое. В голове набатом звучит одна мысль — медикарий, как можно скорее...{/n}

{n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше тело измучено. Ваш разум надломлен. Невзирая на ваши исступленные вопли, ксенос довел свой чудовищный эксперимент до конца прежде чем оставил вас в покое. В голове набатом звучит одна мысль — медикарий, как можно скорее...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your body is harrowed. Your mind is fractured. Ignoring your frantic screams, the xenos completed his horrific experiment before leaving you be. A single thought tolls in your mind: you need a chirurgeon, and you need them now...{/n}

{n}Your body is harrowed. Your mind is fractured. Ignoring your frantic screams, the xenos completed his horrific experiment before leaving you be. A single thought tolls in your mind: you need a chirurgeon, and you need them now...{/n}

{n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

{n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

{n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes à bout, tant physiquement que mentalement. Le xénos termine son abominable expérience en ignorant vos hurlements désespérés. La douleur chasse toutes les pensées de votre esprit, sauf une : vous avez besoin d'un chirurgeon... immédiatement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes à bout, tant physiquement que mentalement. Le xénos termine son abominable expérience en ignorant vos hurlements désespérés. La douleur chasse toutes les pensées de votre esprit, sauf une : vous avez besoin d'un chirurgeon... immédiatement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Estás agotad{mf|o|a}. Tu cuerpo está al límite y tu mente, fracturada. El xenos ignora tus gritos desesperados para dar los últimos toques a su tétrico experimento. El dolor aparta todos los pensamientos de tu cabeza excepto uno: necesitas un cirujano... ya.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Estás agotad{mf|o|a}. Tu cuerpo está al límite y tu mente, fracturada. El xenos ignora tus gritos desesperados para dar los últimos toques a su tétrico experimento. El dolor aparta todos los pensamientos de tu cabeza excepto uno: necesitas un cirujano... ya.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你变得筋疲力尽。你的身体残破不堪，思维也变得支离破碎。玛拉斋完全不在意你疯狂的惨叫，完成了他可怕的实验。你的脑子里除了剧痛之外，已经没有任何其他的想法，除了这个——你需要找船医过来……现在就要。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你变得筋疲力尽。你的身体残破不堪，思维也变得支离破碎。玛拉斋完全不在意你疯狂的惨叫，完成了他可怕的实验。你的脑子里除了剧痛之外，已经没有任何其他的想法，除了这个——你需要找船医过来……现在就要。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは疲れている。あなたの身体は消耗し、精神は骨折している。異種族はあなたの必死の叫びを無視して、恐ろしい実験を終えた。痛みによって、あなたの頭から1つの考えを除いてすべての考えが消え去る。チラージョンが必要と言うことのみだ。それも、今すぐにだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは疲れている。あなたの身体は消耗し、精神は骨折している。異種族はあなたの必死の叫びを無視して、恐ろしい実験を終えた。痛みによって、あなたの頭から1つの考えを除いてすべての考えが消え去る。チラージョンが必要と言うことのみだ。それも、今すぐにだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist erschöpft. Dein Körper ist entkräftet, dein Verstand zersplittert. Der Xenos ignoriert deine wilden Schreie und bringt sein grauenhaftes Experiment zu Ende. Der Schmerz treibt alle Gedanken aus deinem Kopf, nur ein einziger verbleibt: Du brauchst einen Chirurgeum, und zwar schnell.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist erschöpft. Dein Körper ist entkräftet, dein Verstand zersplittert. Der Xenos ignoriert deine wilden Schreie und bringt sein grauenhaftes Experiment zu Ende. Der Schmerz treibt alle Gedanken aus deinem Kopf, nur ein einziger verbleibt: Du brauchst einen Chirurgeum, und zwar schnell.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bitkin düşüyorsun. Bedenin iflas ediyor, zihnin darmadağın oluyor. Zeno, hummalı çığlıklarını önemsemeden korkunç deneyini tamamlıyor. Acı, zihnindeki bütün düşünceleri silip süpürüyor. Tek bir tanesi hariç: Bir cerraha ihtiyacın var. Hem de hemen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are exhausted. Your body is spent and your mind is fractured. The xenos ignores your frantic screams as he finishes his horrific experiment. The pain drives all the thoughts from your head except one — you need a chirurgeon... and you need one now.{/n}
